final_answer.explanation: Feargus O'Connor was an Irish Chartist leader who died at the age of 59. He was born on July 18, 1796, and passed away on August 30, 1855. The context also mentions that he is commemorated by a public art piece, which is made of stone and created by an unknown artist. This information is crucial for understanding his legacy and the significance of the commemoration, particularly in relation to his actions, including the assault on three MPs after the failure of his Land Plan. The age at which he died is a direct answer to the question posed, while the details about the public art piece and the artist provide additional context about his legacy.

graph.title: Age of Feargus O'Connor
graph.content: <806>[Age of Feargus O'Connor] Identify the age of Feargus O'Connor at his death.</806>
graph.answer: Feargus O'Connor, the Irish Chartist leader, was born on 18 July 1796 and died on 30 August 1855. To determine his age at death, we subtract his birth year from his death year: 1855 - 1796 = 59. Therefore, Feargus O'Connor was 59 years old at the time of his death.
